comment._content: LOC: the word "work" does not appear in Bain's caption to this photo.

comment._content:
More German prisoners -- these near Villeroy:

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: The word "work" may be from the caption cards supplied by Bain, which do not always exactly match information on the negatives.  The titles we use were taken from the caption cards.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Same photo from Agence Meurisse on Gallica site (see Meurisse number on side upper left). Caption: "A Soissons : prisonniers allemands dans les rues" At Soissons: German prisoners in the streets. gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b90416832 Pub. date 1914

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: artolog: We will update the image description with information from the matching image on the Gallica site.  Thanks!
